ygData.subject: My new EarthLink email address
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi. I wanted to let you know that I ve switched to EarthLink for my Internet access, and I now have a new email address. So please send all email to my new
ygData.messageBody:
Hi. I wanted to let you know that I've switched to EarthLink for my Internet access, and I now have a new email address.

So please send all email to my new EarthLink email address:

minnie333@...

I don't want to miss any of your messages, so please take a moment to write down my new address and add it to your email address book.

Thanks!
Eric

P.S. My old email address was (none)


********************************
EarthLink - The #1 provider of the Real Internet
http://www.earthlink.net/

********************************
